Tactical Card Duels. Strategy Over Luck.

Deploy your formation. Attack by column. Drain your opponent to zero LP. Phalanx turns a standard deck of cards into a head-to-head battle of wits — playable on a kitchen table or in any browser.

Play Online → Learn to Play Full Rules

Mission Status

  • Phase: Digital Alpha Active
  • Playable: Yes, real-time matches & spectator mode
  • Platform: Browser (Mobile + Desktop) / Tabletop (Physical)

Read full status and known limitations.

Standard Deck, Modern Rules

Use any standard suited deck (Ace through King). Phalanx brings deep tactical gameplay to the most accessible medium in the world.

Formation-Based Combat

Build your squads in two rows. Manage how damage overflows from your front line to your back line and finally to your LP.

Suit Identity & Powers

Diamonds & Hearts raise Shields on death. Spades & Clubs deliver devastating Weapons and overflow bonuses.

Tactical Quickstart

  1. Prepare: One standard deck per player (recommended) or one shared deck.
  2. Deploy: Set up 8 cards in a 4x2 formation (Front and Back rows).
  3. Attack: Take turns attacking with your Front-row cards by column.
  4. Overflow: Damage cascades through the column before hitting Player LP.
  5. Win: Reduce your opponent to 0 LP or destroy their entire formation.
